title: Local Authorities refusal of housing from NAMA is scandalous (Irish Labour Party)
text: ( Source : Irish Labour Party ) 1 October 2015 Statement by Joe Costello TD The statement by NAMA today at the Public Accounts Committee that 31 local authorities throughout the country, including the four local authorities in Dublin , refused
